attributes.title: Its All In the Game Bhagavad Gita by Nithyananda
attributes.description:
Download Full Discourse at https://lifeblissprograms.org/content/bg-day030-2011-09sep-21-its-all-game-talk-nithyananda-bhagavad-gita

Bhagavad Gita (Song of God) is timeless treatise on the essence of living enlightenment. The Gita was imparted by the enlightened Hindu incarnation Sri Krishna to the warrior-prince Arjuna over 5000 years ago. Amazingly, the spiritual wisdom and life solutions offered in the Gita are so universal and current that it is even today used as a personal transformation guide in universities and management schools worldwide.

In this talk on Bhagavad Gita (Chapter 2, Verse 20), Paramahamsa Nithyananda points out that all the joy and sorrow of this drama we call Life is nothing but our own playful choice! If we can just remember this, Life can be a beautiful, colorful experience. We can play with love, play with fighting, we can dabble in life casually. But instead, we identify ourselves with this perishable body and identity, experiencing fleeting pleasures and every day facing the terrifying prospect of Death. Forgetting that we are only playing, and that our living spirit continues beyond these passing events into Immortality, we create needless suffering for ourselves.
